snippet: Jazz & Colors, an event previously in Central Park, has bands playing the same set across a broad location. On Friday, it hit the Metropolitan Museum of Art.
abstract: Ben Ratliff reviews performance by various jazz bands throughout the Metropolitan Museum of Art as part of Jazz & Colors event.
lead_paragraph: Jazz & Colors, an event previously in Central Park, has bands playing the same set across a broad location. On Friday, it hit the Metropolitan Museum of Art.

headline.print_headline: Exalting Tunes on a Big Canvas
headline.seo: Jazz & Colors: The Masterworks Edition Takes Over the Metropolitan
headline.main: Exalting Tunes on a Big Canvas
